attachments.title: Last call for GSoC 2021 Mentors/Admins
attachments.text: Hey all, we will be submitting our project application tonight (PST) for GSoC 2021. If you want to get involved as an admin or mentor, see here: Seeking Julia Mentors and Projects for GSoC 2021 and please get in touch asap!
attachments.fallback: JuliaLang: Last call for GSoC 2021 Mentors/Admins

elements.text: In case you all are interested:

text: Is there a list of ideas already one could look at if one is suitable?

attachments.text: Hey all, we will be submitting our project application tonight (PST) for GSoC 2021. If you want to get involved as an admin or mentor, see here: Seeking Julia Mentors and Projects for GSoC 2021 and please get in touch asap!

elements.text: In case you all are interested:

text: <https://julialang.org/jsoc/projects/> but you can bring also your own ideas, provided that you can find a suitable mentor (and it's too early to apply)

text: Awesome, i hope this list is helpful to motivate mentors to join.
